name: HomeRemediesNatural
0:
”Alexa ask home remedies how to cure fever”
”Alexa ask home remedies how to reduce stress”
”Alexa ask home remedies how to fix jet lag”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home remedies
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Natural home remedies are safe and useful for common ailments. Most of the disease is not life threatening and they can be treated at home.

Learn how to use natural remedies to replace many of the over-the-counter drugs most commonly used in the treatment of common diseases. If you are using home remedies wisely, you will be saving your time and money. We hope this application helps you find your own way of healing through natural remedies. 

Benefits of Home Remedies 
- Composed of herbs, spices, fruits, and vegetables 
- It can cure 100 of ailments such as acne, common cold, cough, flu, hair loss, back pain , stress, diabetes and high blood pressure 
- Effective to increase your child's immunity
- Helps to recover faster in the elderly 
- Natural and joy of self healing 

To use this skill say Alexa, ask home remedies and add your symptoms like: "Alexa, ask home remedies how to reduce stress", "Alexa, ask home remedies how to cure headache", and many more.

Check this skill against 100+ day to day symptoms you want to cure naturally. For the complete list of symptoms this skill covers, say "Alexa, ask home remedies for list of symptoms".

"Let your food be your medicine and your medicine be your food". - Hippocrates

Disclaimer: 
This information is not a substitute for professional medical advice or health information, examination, diagnosis or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make on this information.
priv:
